column5: Is Busters BBQ in Vermillion Bay still open?
No, they are closed for the winter but will be opening back up in the spring. Great food!
What kind of menu do they have? Do they serve alcohol? We always eat at the corner place, but that has gone down hill.
http://www.bustersbbq.com/default_rest.html They are a "fully licensed" establishment --- yes you can get a beer!
